Name: Name Change, Bob Marley Blvd, Brooklyn
Title: A Local Law in relation to the naming of one thoroughfare and public place, Bob Marley Boulevard, Borough of Brooklyn.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Parks and Recreation
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section 1. The following street name, in the Borough of Brooklyn, is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.

New Name	Present Name	Limits	
Bob Marley Boulevard	Church Avenue	North side of Church Avenue from Albany Avenue to New York Avenue and both sides of Church Avenue from New York Avenue to Bedford Avenue	
	
	Â§2. This local law shall take effect immediately.


8/10/06
PM
11:00 A.M.
